cab.content: Military Secret.1423From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2tith August 1920.(Received 3 p.m.)11225.. 26th August. No. 208.Part I. (1) Hijrat suspension has not yet had time to re-act on tribes north of Kabul river and some excitement still continues.(2) Tochi Wazirs are making renewed efforts to settle and to induce (?) raiders to return.(3) Mahsud situation continues satisfactory. Nearly all Mahsud fighting men who emigrated to Khost have returned.(4) On 10th instant six Russians, said to be Wireless personnel, arrived at Herat en route to Kabul.Part II. (5) As result of Khilafat agitation, situation on Hazara border between Oghi and Mansehra has become unsettled, and at request of Chief Commissioner troops belonging to Abbottabad have been sent into district affected, as precautionary measure. Latest information is to. the effect that the situation is improving.(6) East Persia : withdrawal normal.Paras, (4), (5), (6) not given to Press.
